message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product I know you'll find valuable. Given its worth, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,500,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing.  While $1,200,000 is a strong offer, the value this product brings requires me to hold firm at a minimum of $1,350,000.  I believe this price point reflects a fair compromise. What do you think?
I understand your perspective, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our prices. Can you consider a price of $1,250,000?
